text: Amli is a census town in the Union Territory of Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu in India. ==Geography== Amli is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Amli It has an average elevation of 26 metres (85 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Amli had a population of 28,566. Males constitute 39% of the population and females 61%. Amli has an average literacy rate of 70%, higher than the national average of 59.5%. About 15% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== : Category:Cities and towns in Dadra and Nagar Haveli district
title: Amli, India
